name: Epic Dumb Story
description:
“You have no idea how life could be as a complete loser, or else, in case you do know, then I’m sincerely sorry for you. Either way, learn about my story of a dumbass loser’s life which turned out to be pretty epic in the end. Get ready to be surprised.”
----Not just some loser: Justin XXXX

This game takes you on a lifetime journey which takes off at a certain point of time when our hero Justin was still a dumb loser back in the days. You will be determined to help him live his life and eventually witness how everything turned out to be so unbelievable.

There will be puzzles for you to solve, tasks for you to complete, and action mini-games all in the mix. Except for the interest of the story-telling, there will be plenty of challenges to drive you forward. So keep it up!

Features:
*Fun story plus mixed-up game-play. All-so-much-in-ONE!!
* HELP, we support you with various ways of help, SKIP the level if you are stuck, or get a HINT to figure out how to pass. You can always buy the helper props when you run out.
* ALL LEVELS FOR FREE, we now have 20 levels, and it’s just a mere beginning of his lifetime story. Hence, get ready for MORE and MORE free levels!!!
*See if you can manage to proceed faster than your friends through gamecenter.
*Life is never too easy. We hope that this game will help you gain some hope. Never stop trying, because things do get better, in time.
